page.title: 15HEALTH SERVICE- COBHAM SY
page.content:
{COBHAM AMBULANCE SERVICE}.Cobham Ambulance Station had 560 calls from April 1st. to July 18th.: about 5 calls a day. They mostly help people keep hospital appointments and take emergency patients to Kingston, Guildford, Chertsey or Epsom hospitals. They have 3 ambulances (one is on 24hr call) and 13 ambulance men.
Minor cases are taken to {COBHAM {COTTAGE HOSPITAL}which was opened in 1805 and has beds for 20 patients. It has an operating theatre but no X-ray department. There is an out-patients' clinic for accidents, blood-tests and physiotherapy. Six doctors from {the {VILLAGE HEALTH CENTRE}, 19 nurses and a matron help to run the hospital.
